quote: He who asks a question is a fool for five minutes; he who does not ask remains a fool forever.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you’d have preferred to talk.
author: Doug Larson

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty.
author: Henry Ford

quote: In seeking knowledge you stray; in cherishing it you find rest.
author: Rumi

quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
author: Anthony J. D’Angelo

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: You don’t understand anything until you learn it more than one way.
author: Marvin Minsky

quote: Real learning comes about when the competitive spirit has ceased.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: We learn more by looking for the answer to a question and not finding it than we do from learning the answer itself.
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Wisdom ceases to be wisdom when it becomes too proud to weep, too grave to laugh, and too selfish to seek other than itself.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don’t know anything about.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: One learns by doing a thing; for though you think you know it, you have no certainty until you try.
author: Sophocles

quote: True learning is remembering something you never knew you knew.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
author: Confucius

quote: Read not to contradict and confute, nor to believe and take for granted… but to weigh and consider.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: It is what we know already that often prevents us from learning.
author: Claude Bernard

quote: By learning you will teach; by teaching you will learn.
author: Latin Proverb

quote: Wisdom is the daughter of experience.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: To teach is to learn twice over.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: The ear of the leader must ring with the voices of the people.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: A capacity and taste for reading gives access to whatever has already been discovered by others.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Knowledge is power.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Better than a thousand days of diligent study is one day with a great teacher.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The best teachers are those who show you where to look but don’t tell you what to see.
author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

quote: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
author: Carl Jung

quote: It is not that I’m so smart. But I stay with the questions much longer.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Every student can learn, just not on the same day or in the same way.
author: George Evans

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You learn something every day if you pay attention.
author: Ray LeBlond

quote: The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: Education’s purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Creativity is seeing what everyone else has seen, and thinking what no one else has thought.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.
author: Confucius

quote: Learning is not compulsory… neither is survival.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self‐education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: You cannot open a book without learning something.
author: Confucius

quote: Self-education is, I firmly believe, the only kind of education there is.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Teaching is learning twice.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Learning to read is the gateway to the world.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: The best lessons are learned after things go wrong.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: I am always ready to learn although I do not always like being taught.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel.
author: Socrates

quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
author: James Joyce

quote: The more I read, the more I acquire, the more certain I am that I know nothing.
author: Voltaire

quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost.
author: Confucius

quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Learning is a lifelong process of keeping abreast of change.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: To learn something new, you must accept that you might be wrong.
author: Ray Dalio

quote: Learning is finding out what you already know.
author: Richard Bach

quote: There is no end to education. It is not that you read a book, pass an examination, and finish with education.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The best minds are not in government. If any were, business would steal them away.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Learning is the only thing the mind never exhausts.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Curiosity is the engine of achievement.
author: Sir Ken Robinson

quote: Learning is the eye of the mind.
author: American Proverb

quote: Self-education is the foundation of growth.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The essence of teaching is to make learning contagious.
author: Seymour Papert

quote: One learns by doing a thing; for though you think you know it, you have no certainty until you try.
author: Sophocles

quote: A good teacher protects his students from his own influence.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Learning is the ultimate act of humility.
author: Unknown

quote: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
author: Brian Herbert

quote: The best teacher is experience learned from failures.
author: Byron Pulsifer

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that it never ends.
author: Unknown

quote: Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Learning is seeing the same thing from different perspectives.
author: Ken Robinson

quote: To know how to learn is the greatest gift.
author: Aristotle

quote: Learning is the key that unlocks the doors of opportunity.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: Learning is a journey, not a destination.
author: Unknown

quote: Each day learn something new and just as important, relearn something old.
author: Robert Brault

quote: The best way to learn is to do; the worst way to teach is to talk.
author: Paul Halmos

quote: Learning is an active process.
author: Michael Polanyi
